TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParentIterator extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Iterates over the matching parent node according to the , parent axis rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Create (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator context, System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter);
.method public hidebysig instance void Create(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator context, class System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter) cil managed

Docs.param: The node from which you start traversing the nodes.
An instance of the class, which enables you to filter nodes based on the name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Positions the iterator on the next matching parent node.
Docs.returns: if the next matching parent node exists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the next matching parent node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
